scripts.build:playht:local: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=playht NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=localhost pnpm run build
scripts.build:playht:alpha: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=playht NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=staging pnpm run build
scripts.build:playht:prod: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=playht NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=production pnpm run build
scripts.build:playai:local: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=playai NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=localhost pnpm run build
scripts.build:playai:alpha: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=playai NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=staging pnpm run build
scripts.build:playai:prod: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_VARIANT=playai NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=production pnpm run build
scripts.publish:playht:alpha: pnpm run build:playht:alpha && pnpm publish --tag ht-alpha --no-git-checks
scripts.publish:playht:prod: pnpm run build:playht:prod && pnpm publish --tag ht --no-git-checks
scripts.publish:playai:alpha: pnpm run build:playai:alpha && pnpm publish --tag alpha --no-git-checks
scripts.publish:playai:prod: pnpm run build:playai:prod && pnpm publish --tag latest --no-git-checks
